name: Panzo
description:
Meet with your best friend Panzo! A puzzle-platformer game.

NOTE: IF YOU GET STUCK, PRESS MOUSE WHEEL BUTTON TO RESET CURRENT LEVEL

This was my first game jam. It was fun and buggy.

Movement:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

Building:

Q - Open Database

R - Rotate

E - Change Item

LMB - Build Object

RMB - Delete Object

General:

Mouse Wheel Button - Reset Level

ESC - Pause
